articles.title: Unlocking AI's reasoning power: How Chain-of-Thought prompting is revolutionizing large language models

It allows LLMs to break down complex problems into smaller, manageable steps, much like how humans approach reasoning tasks. This approach improves accuracy and transparency into the model's thought process. CoT prompting outperformed traditional methods on tasks requiring arithmetic, commonsense reasoning and symbolic logic.

articles.summary: Alphabet's Google launched an experimental version of its search engine today that completely eliminates its classic 10 blue links in favor of an AI-generated summary. The new feature is available to Google One AI Premium subscribers and can be accessed via the results page for any search query by clicking a tab.

articles.title: Google is adding more AI Overviews and a new ‘AI Mode' to Search
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Google announced on Wednesday that it will start showing AI Overviews for even more kinds of queries. Users around the world, even those who are logged out of Google will start seeing them too. There's an even more ambitious AI search in the coming years.

articles.title: Transform Home Services Communication with Wolf Bot AI's Revolutionary AI Voice Agent
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Wolf Bot AI introduces its cutting-edge AI Voice Agent designed for home services. Ai Voice Agents sound just like humans and can be trained quickly with your data. They can handle cold calling, answering inbound calls and scheduling appointments 24/7. Wolf Bot AI can handle any business process.

articles.title: Christie's first AI art auction sees hits... and plenty of misses
articles.author: ANGELA WEISS
articles.summary: Christie's first auction of art made by artificial intelligence (AI) ended Wednesday with mixed results. Fourteen of the 34 lots received no qualifying bids or were sold for less than the minimum Christie's had estimated. This page requires Javascript to be able to read premium content.

articles.title: Minnesota considers blocking 'nudify' apps that use AI to make explicit images without consent
articles.author: Steve Karnowski
articles.summary: Molly Kelly was targeted by someone who used 'nudification' technology to create sexually explicit videos and images of her. Minnesota is considering a new strategy for cracking down on deepfake pornography. A bill that has bipartisan support would target companies that run websites and apps allowing people to upload a photo that can be transformed into explicit images or videos.

articles.title: Mein Kulturkampf
articles.author: David Yearsley on
articles.summary: The increase in AI-generated images of Donald Trump presages yet another crude campaign to extract profits from the MAGA masses. The first of the AI 'artworks' to gain the notoriety that is the perquisite for personal enrichment styled Trump as an orchestral conductor. Leonard Bernstein wound up the Vienna Philharmonic and then let it run without conducting at all.
